entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 7 except plus 2 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 7 except plus 2 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
